languages.text: Останки вытряхнуты на пол, и подведенный водный насос превратил саркофаг в цистерну.
The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.
languages.original_text: Останки вытряхнуты на пол, и подведенный водный насос превратил саркофаг в цистерну.

traits.locale_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

languages.text: Les profanateurs ont vidé le sarcophage de son contenu avant d'y brancher une pompe à eau pour le transformer en citerne.
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

traits.locale_text: Les profanateurs ont vidé le sarcophage de son contenu avant d'y brancher une pompe à eau pour le transformer en citerne.

languages.text: Los profanadores tiraron los restos al suelo y conectaron una bomba de agua para convertir el sarcófago en una cisterna.
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

traits.locale_text: Los profanadores tiraron los restos al suelo y conectaron una bomba de agua para convertir el sarcófago en una cisterna.

languages.text: 污染者把尸骨倒在了地板上，在棺柩上接了水泵，把它变成了一个蓄水池。
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

traits.locale_text: 污染者把尸骨倒在了地板上，在棺柩上接了水泵，把它变成了一个蓄水池。

languages.text: 汚職人たちは遺体を床に捨て、水ポンプをつないで石棺を貯水槽に変えた。
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

traits.locale_text: 汚職人たちは遺体を床に捨て、水ポンプをつないで石棺を貯水槽に変えた。

languages.text: Die Grabschänder haben die Überreste achtlos auf den Boden geworfen und dann eine Wasserpumpe angeschlossen, um den Sarcophagus in eine Zisterne umzuwandeln.
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.

traits.locale_text: Die Grabschänder haben die Überreste achtlos auf den Boden geworfen und dann eine Wasserpumpe angeschlossen, um den Sarcophagus in eine Zisterne umzuwandeln.

languages.text: İstilacılar, ölünün kalıntılarını yere atıp ardından su pompası bağlayarak lahdi bir sarnıca dönüştürmüş.
languages.original_text: The defilers dumped the remains on the floor, then connected a water pump to turn the sarcophagus into a cistern.
